Best Sellers Of Week

Double Patty Chicken Burger.

A juicy chicken fillet with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and creamy mayo in a toasted bun. Perfectly seasoned and deliciously satisfying!

Paneer Cheese Pizza.

A fusion delight with marinated paneer, bell peppers, onions, and mozzarella on a crispy crust. A perfect blend of Indian and Italian flavors!

Fresh Watermelon Mojito

A refreshing blend of juicy watermelon, fresh mint, lime, and a splash of soda. The perfect thirst-quencher for a hot day!
